name: Ducky King
description:
Keyboard Controls

WASD  >  move / climb ladder

Space  >  Jump

Left Shift  >  Quack

Gamepad Controls

LS  >  move / climb ladder

A  >  Jump

X  >  Quack

I started off by making the basics of the original Donkey Kong, but with a duck as the main character.  Then it turned into something more and now I love it and have big plans for it.  

Still in development, follow to stay tuned!  And please provide me some feedback on some ideas for improvement!

You can find the code for the project on my Github.
